strapiPost.title: Gravette Seeks Public Input For Comprehensive Plan
strapiPost.content:
In partnership with Northwest Arkansas Regional Planning, Gravette is working on an update for the city's comprehensive plan, which directs the growth and development of the town.

  • Future vision: The policies outlined in the plan will guide the decisions of the Planning Commission and City Council in the coming years, and the city wants your feedback to set the vision in line with the citizens' wants/needs.
  • Present survey: The survey covers various topics like the quality of life, infrastructure, and the I-49 bypass.

Add your voice to the survey HERE.
